page.title: 02Maxstoke,near Coleshill.
page.content: Maxstoke is due east of Coleshill in the river Blythe valley.Much of the land is still owned by the Fetherstone -Dilke family who live in the very fine Maxstoke castle.This is undamaged beautifully maitained,and quite often open to the public.The parkland of the castle is a golf course and has a new club house.Maxstoke is a scattered village with no real centre.Church End has a few houses,a lovely church and partly ruined Maxstoke Priory.There is no shop or public house and as the school was closed the children go to school in Coleshill.The houses are mixed and include a "cruck"house,some large and new houses,a few council houses and several very fine half timbered houses and farm houses.This is a very beautiful area situated in the ancient Forest of Arden.
